entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:35 a.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 4.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 11:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 4.4°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this morning. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Periods of snow early in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High 8. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
